item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 12, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:

5. Visualizing World War II (288 points | 64 comments)
6. Nowadays (YC S23) Is Hiring ( | hide)
7. Spanish police arrest ex-fraud chief after €20M found in walls of his house (22 points | 2 comments)

24. Defensive Communication (1961) (108 points | 44 comments)
25. Tinfoil.com – Dedicated to the preservation of early recorded sounds (62 points | 20 comments)
26. Revealing causal links in complex systems: New algorithm shows hidden influences (84 points | 15 comments)
27. Improving Steam Client Stability on Linux (428 points | 128 comments)
28. What I wish someone told me about Postgres (241 points | 102 comments)
29. Peng quadrotor autonomy framework visualized in the browser (27 points | 2 comments)
